name: py-trimesh

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: easy
variants.description: Install soft dependencies and unlock extra functionality

description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-chardet
dependencies.description: Universal encoding detector for Python 2 and 3

dependencies.name: py-colorlog
dependencies.description: A colored formatter for the python logging module

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-lxml
dependencies.description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-mapbox-earcut
dependencies.description:
Python bindings for the C++ implementation of the Mapbox Earcut library,
which provides very fast and quite robust triangulation of 2D polygons.

dependencies.name: py-msgpack
dependencies.description: MessagePack (de)serializer.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.

dependencies.name: py-pycollada
dependencies.description: Python library for reading and writing collada documents

dependencies.name: py-pyglet
dependencies.description:
pyglet is a cross-platform windowing and multimedia library for Python
for developing games and other visually rich applications.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-rtree
dependencies.description: R-Tree spatial index for Python GIS.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-shapely
dependencies.description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.

dependencies.name: py-svgpath
dependencies.description:
svg.path is a collection of objects that implement the different path
commands in SVG, and a parser for SVG path definitions.

dependencies.name: py-sympy
dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.

dependencies.name: py-xxhash
dependencies.description: xxhash is a Python binding for the xxHash library by Yann Collet.
